UNKNOWN_ERROR_DETAILS: Oops, that's unexpected. Do you mind reporting the steps that led to this, in our chat, so we can troubleshoot ASAP.

signup.title: Create an account
signup.subtitle: No credit card required. Get started in minutes.

verify.title: Verify your email
verify.desc: We’ve send a verification code to {{id}}. Please check your email.

signup.only_work_email_allowed_error: Only work email is allowed to signup.
signup.account_created_successfully: Your account has been created successfully.
signup.success: Your account has been created successfully

forgot_password.title: Forgot password
forgot_password.help_text: Enter your email below to reset your password.
forgot_password.reset_password_description: Enter your new password and select next when you’re done.

verify_code.title: Verify your identity
verify_code.desc: Before we can let you through, we need to verify your identity. You should have received an email with a verification code
verify_code.invalid_otp_error: OTP Code must be of 6 digits. Please enter correct the OTP.
verify_code.sent_new_otp: A new email is sent, you should receive it shortly

home.no_data: No automation projects are configured yet. Go ahead, create one!

filter.error: Type at-least two characters to search

settings.title: Settings
settings.profile_and_security_desc: Update your name, email, avatar. Keep your data and account secure.
settings.billing_desc: Manage your credit card, view billing reports and more.
settings.notifications_desc: Choose how and where you want app notifications to appear.
settings.data_desc: Manage your data, delete it or remove your account.

billing.no_credit_card_desc: You will need to add a credit card in order to access paid features.
billing.no_invoices_desc: You don’t have any invoices at the moment. Once you do, they will appear here.
billing.remove_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to remove your credit card? You will no longer have access to paid features.
billing.one_time_payment_desc: Make a one time payment to clear a pending balance or add account credits.
billing.confirm_check_text: this will remove your current credit card

crop_marker.label: Crop marker
crop_marker.short_desc: This will serve as a reference point for the automated crop action.

crop_from_card.label: Crop from
crop_from_card.subtitle: Example: Crop the image from below the nose

crop_around_card.label: Crop around
crop_around_card.subtitle: Example: Crop the image around the face

crop_size.label: Crop size
crop_size.short_desc: You can change values here to resize the cropped area.

upload.files_skipped: Some files are skipped! Only jpeg, png, webp and gif upto 25MB are supported.

drag_and_dropped.title: Drag and drop your media
drag_and_dropped.subtitle: Feel free to drop multiple files in one go.
drag_and_dropped.desc_1: Our media uploader is designed for ingesting large
drag_and_dropped.desc_2: batches of files quickly from your desktop.

select_media_modal.title: Start smart crop
select_media_modal.desc: You're about to start the smart crop automation on selected files.

add_custom_size.title: Add custom size
add_custom_size.confirm_delete_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this custom size?

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.subtitle: Background
parameters.desc: We will add a background if the image doesn’t completely fill the available space

errors.hex_format: Please enter a valid hex value

upload.upload_more_tooltip_text: For an even faster upload experience, try drag-n-drop to anywhere on this page.
upload.page_out_upload_cancel_confirm: Upload is in progress. Do you want to cancel the uploads?
upload.confirm_upload_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the upload?

tip.title: Tip
tip.desc: You can close this window worry free. We'll continue processing your media.

summary.title: Smart crop automation crop from top of nose

stop_modal.title: Stop smart crop
stop_modal.desc: You will need to duplicate this smart crop if you want to restart it.

summary.paused_toast_label: This smart crop automation is currently paused

automation_running.title: Cropping in progress
automation_running.desc: We’re currently processing your media. We’ll alert you once the crops are ready. Feel free to close this now.

download.label: Download
download.download_desc: You're {{count}} crops zip is ready to download.

download_all_modal.title: Are you sure you want to download {{count}} crop images?
download_all_modal.desc: You can not undo this action.

asset.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this asset?
